featured.text: And there are plenty of models from which to choose: from simple $200 point-and-shoot snappers to $1,000 wonders with all the features that any advanced amateur could want.

definition.zh_def: 一種具有鮮豔顏色的魚，通常生活在熱帶和亞熱帶水域，常被用作食材。
definition.en_def: A type of brightly colored fish commonly found in tropical and subtropical waters, often used as food.
definition.example: The chef prepared a delicious snapper dish for the guests.
